abstract: Five officers from British intelligence agency MI5 testify at trial of accused Al Qaeda operative Abid Naseer in Brooklyn while wearing disguises; recount surveillance of defendant conducted in Manchester, England; evidence does not appear to be damning.
lead_paragraph: Before a federal grand jury in Brooklyn, officers from the British agency MI5 told of watching Abid Naseer, a suspect in a bomb plot, as he rode buses, went to a mosque and visited an Internet cafe.

headline.main: In Disguises, Spies Testify of Watching Terror Suspect
headline.print_headline: In Disguises, Spies Testify of Watching Terror Suspect
